title: 怎么给别人使用/spawn和/home的权限
author: Designer
txt_content: 如题 给其他用户组权限

replies.author: 怒风丶
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp 组 Essentials.spawn     来给组添加某某权限
/mangaddp 组 Essentials.home
拿spawn来说 例如我给普通玩家的分组权限/mangaddp builder spawn

replies.author: Designer
replies.txt_content:
2511512500 发表于 2014-8-12 13:36
拿spawn来说 例如我给普通玩家的分组权限/mangaddp builder spawn
不可以啊  只能在社区用权限
